name: herringbone book - teal
description:
Across the spine of this sturdy book runs a delicate herringbone pattern. Hand sewn in a stitch of my own design with strong cream linen thread, this book feels good in my hands...

170 pages (340 sides) of thin, crisp, creamy paper are contained in a speckly grey cover of recycled leather, a lovely bend-able durable material. The inside of the cover is a bright teal blue. A weighty book with a nice flex.


15 x 17 x 4cm (5.5 x 6.5 x 1.5") 


Opens flat, fill it with your thoughts :)
